description:
After wearing a sailor uniform to school, Shuichi can no longer go to school.  Maho also refuses to go to school, and Shuichi feels responsible.  After receiving a letter from Yoshino, Shuichi decides to return to school, but his classmates tease him for dressing up like a girl, while Doi continues to berate him, so he spends his days in the nurse`s office instead of his classroom.  That`s when Shuichi`s class decides to do a genderbent play for the cultural festival...
Source: crunchyroll
